description:
Yuma befriends a broken Litterbot only to discover that it has been programmed to do the dirty work for a wanted jewel thief.  Can Yuma put a stop to this thief’s thieving ways, or will Yuma’s newest friend trash his plan to stop him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuma vs The Cleaning Robot Obomi
遊馬vsお掃除ロボット オボミ
